name: Give NFTs
author: Supermint

sections.description:
“Give NFTs” by SuperMint enables any WordPress site to seamlessly integrate NFT issuance into their workflow. Ideal for businesses, non-profits, and organizations looking to provide value and drive growth through digital engagement.

Configure Plugin

1. Generate API Key

  • Register and create an API Key from https://supermint.ca under Dashboard > API Keys.
  • Paste the API Key in the “Give NFTs” plugin settings in WordPress.

2. Positioning the [give-bcards] Shortcode

  • Insert [give-bcards] in your desired page or post content.
  • Place it near the donation button for better visibility.

Email Auto-Forwarding (Required)

For security, each time a donor opts in for a bCard and makes a donation (or purchase), you must send an email to confirm@donation.supermint.ca containing the email address your donor (or user if not a charity site) used to make their transaction.
For example, if donor@mail.com opted in for a bCard and then continued to make a donation (or purchase), you must confirm that they made this donation by sending an email confirm@donation.supermint.ca containing donor@mail.com. This process can be automated by setting up your email client to automatically forward us your “confirmation of donation” emails (ensure the donor’s email is included).

Note: These emails confirm successful donor transactions before minting their NFT.

Important: If a user hasn’t received their NFT after completing a transaction, email the user’s address to confirm@donation.supermint.ca to initiate the NFT (bCard) dispatch.

Privacy Notice: Emails are automatically discarded after verification.

Setting Up Email Forwarding in Gmail

  1. In Gmail (dovindustries@gmail.com), go to Settings > See all settings > Forwarding and POP/IMAP.
  2. Click ‘Add a forwarding address’ and enter confirm@donation.supermint.ca.
  3. Verify the forwarding address as prompted.
  4. Select ‘Forward a copy of incoming mail to’ and choose confirm@donation.supermint.ca.
  5. Save Changes.
  6. Go to Filters and Blocked Addresses > Create a new filter.
  7. In the “From” field, enter your donation notification email address.
  8. Click ‘Create filter’, select ‘Forward it to:’, choose confirm@donation.supermint.ca, and create the filter.

Visit SuperMint for more information on creating and managing your NFTs.

With “Give NFTs”, elevate your digital engagement to new heights.

short_description: Engage and reward users with NFTs on your WordPress site using SuperMint's "Give NFTs" plugin.
